column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75N AT EXIT 113 (PARIS PIKE):
column4: The exit ramp is shut down until further notice due to an overturned wide load.  Motorists can use Exit 110 (Winchester Rd) or Exit 115 (Newtown Pike).
Combs Ferry Rd between Old Todds Rd and Winchester Rd
column5: The roadway is closed to thru traffic due to a damaged semi that will need to be unloaded to be removed.
